input: I paid for 'AWS for ML Engineers' but it’s not showing in my dashboard. What should I do?
output: Please confirm you’re logged into the same email used during purchase. Then refresh the dashboard and check ‘My Courses’. If it still doesn’t appear, share your order ID (or payment reference) and the purchase email—our team can sync the enrollment right away.

input: I purchased by mistake. I didn’t start the course. Can you refund?
output: If you haven’t started (or have minimal progress) and the purchase is recent, you’re usually eligible. Share your order ID and we’ll help you request the refund.

input: How do I ask the instructor a question in 'MLOps Bootcamp'?
output: Use the Q&A/Discussion tab inside the course. Post your question with the lesson name and any error logs or screenshots. This helps the instructor reply faster.

input: How long does it take to finish 'NLP with Transformers'?
output: Most learners complete 'NLP with Transformers' in 2–6 weeks depending on pace. You can learn anytime, and your progress is saved so you can continue where you left off.

input: Can I use one account on multiple devices?
output: Yes, you can sign in on multiple devices. For security, avoid sharing your password and sign out from devices you no longer use.

input: Can I request a live session?
output: If your course includes live sessions, you’ll see the schedule on the course page. If it doesn’t, we can note your request—many courses add live Q&A sessions based on learner demand.

input: I forgot my password and can’t log in.
output: Use the ‘Forgot password’ link on the login page to reset your password. If you don’t receive the reset email within a few minutes, check Spam/Promotions, then tell us the email you used and we’ll help.

input: How do I get the certificate for 'Deep Learning with PyTorch'?
output: Complete all required lessons and assessments, then go to the course page and open the ‘Certificate’ tab (or ‘Completion’ section). If it’s still locked, ensure all graded items are completed.

input: I submitted an assignment in 'MLOps Bootcamp', but it still shows as pending.
output: Sometimes the dashboard takes a few minutes to sync. Please refresh and re-open the assignment page. If it’s still pending after 30 minutes, share a screenshot and your registered email so we can check the submission status.

input: Where can I download the starter code for 'Interview Prep: AI Engineer' projects?
output: Open the lesson that contains the project and look for the ‘Resources’ or ‘Downloads’ section. If you can’t find it, tell me the lesson name and I’ll point you to the exact place.

input: I want to buy 'System Design Basics'. What will I learn and who is it for?
output: 'System Design Basics' covers the core topics step-by-step, with hands-on exercises and projects. It’s ideal for beginners to intermediate learners who want practical skills. You’ll learn the key concepts, complete guided labs, and build a portfolio-ready project by the end.

input: Can I verify my certificate publicly?
output: Yes, certificates usually include a verification link or ID. You can share that link/ID so others can verify your completion.

input: Can I use one account on multiple devices?
output: Yes, you can sign in on multiple devices. For security, avoid sharing your password and sign out from devices you no longer use.

input: I purchased by mistake. I didn’t start the course. Can you refund?
output: If you haven’t started (or have minimal progress) and the purchase is recent, you’re usually eligible. Share your order ID and we’ll help you request the refund.

input: Can I get a refund for 'Machine Learning Foundations'?
output: Refund eligibility depends on your purchase date and how much of the course you’ve completed. If you share your order ID and purchase email, we’ll check eligibility and guide you through the next steps.

input: I accidentally bought the wrong course. Can I switch to 'Frontend for Beginners'?
output: Yes, we can help. If the purchase is recent and you haven’t progressed much, we can switch your enrollment to 'Frontend for Beginners' or process a refund depending on your preference and eligibility.

input: I submitted an assignment in 'Data Analytics with SQL', but it still shows as pending.
output: Sometimes the dashboard takes a few minutes to sync. Please refresh and re-open the assignment page. If it’s still pending after 30 minutes, share a screenshot and your registered email so we can check the submission status.

input: My account got locked after multiple attempts. How do I unlock it?
output: Wait 10–15 minutes and try again, or use password reset to regain access. If it remains locked, share your account email and we’ll unlock it for you.

input: What payment methods do you accept for 'NLP with Transformers'?
output: We typically accept card payments (Visa/Mastercard) and supported local payment options (if available in your region). At checkout you’ll see the exact methods for your location.

input: The video is buffering a lot. What can I do?
output: Try lowering the video quality, switching to a stable network, and closing other heavy downloads. If possible, use a different browser or clear cache. If you share your device/browser, we can suggest the best settings.

input: I submitted an assignment in 'Python for Data Science', but it still shows as pending.
output: Sometimes the dashboard takes a few minutes to sync. Please refresh and re-open the assignment page. If it’s still pending after 30 minutes, share a screenshot and your registered email so we can check the submission status.

input: Does 'MLOps Bootcamp' have prerequisites?
output: 'MLOps Bootcamp' is beginner-friendly. Basic computer skills help. If the course includes advanced parts, we explain required basics first and provide optional prep lessons so you can follow along.

input: When do instructors respond to questions?
output: Response times vary, but most questions are answered within 24–72 hours on business days. If it’s urgent, include ‘urgent’ and provide details so it can be addressed quickly.

input: How do I change my email address?
output: Go to Account Settings → Profile and look for ‘Email’. If changing email requires verification, follow the verification steps. If you can’t access the old email, contact support for manual help.

output: Use the Q&A/Discussion tab inside the course. Post your question with the lesson name and any error logs or screenshots. This helps the instructor reply faster.
